link-description:
anri-du-toit:

i went to the zoo today, alone. i ate a popsicle while i watched the lions sleep, licking it off my hand, melting chemicals, ignoring the screaming children and thinking about the person who realized you could sell frozen sugar-water, and appreciating them, and hating them a little bit. i paid ten…

My friend anri writes really well, you should all read this.
